title: Parthia: The Forgotten Ancient "Superpower" and Its Role in Biblical History
description: It is the story back of the story of America. It is the national story of the Bible which needs to be told...and told often....Only 334 pages, but you will wish there was more from this author.A Very Easy read that flows very smooth.I Highly recommended this for the beginner.Big scores here for this book! Hardcover 334 pages
author: Steven M. Collins
